  1. What's Happening in Lake Stevens
    Stay Informed and Connected


  1. Latest News
  1. Latest News

  1. Volunteer Opportunities

    Are you looking for ways to support your local community? Read on...

  2. Davies Beach Boat Launch Closing for Underwater Work

    The boat launch will be closed from 9 AM to 12 PM on Sunday, April 27, for underwater projects. Read on...

  3. Volunteer Opportunity!

    The city is seeking to fill one vacancy on the Park Board, Salary Commission and Civil Service Commission. Read on...

  4. Lake Stevens Farmers Market 2025

    In their 6th year, the 2025 Lake Stevens Farmers Market summer season returns Wednesdays, 3 pm - 7 pm June 4 - August 27, at North Cove Park. Read on...

  5. Gaming By The Lake Volunteer Call

    The City needs volunteers to support the Gaming By The Lake community event on May 3. Read on...

  6. T.R.A.I.L.S Activity Guide Issue 4

    The latest T.R.A.I.L.S Activity Guide, keeping our community informed of events, recreation programs and classes, activities, and more, is live! Read on...

  7. Meet up with the Mayor

    Community members are invited to join Mayor Brett Gailey at the Starbucks next to MOD Pizza at Frontier Village in Lake Stevens in April. Read on...

  8. Gaming By The Lake

    The community is invited to a family-friendly event on Saturday, May 3, 10 am - 8 pm. Read on...

  9. Free Community Cleanup Event With Waste Management

    Mark your calendars! The free Community Cleanup Event is happening Saturday, April 26th! Read on...

  10. Lost an item at a Lake Stevens Park?

    Contact the Parks and Recreation Department for items lost at our Parks. Read on...

  11. Main Street Construction Project Information

    The City is embarking on a comprehensive project to improve the Main Street infrastructure near North Cove Park. Read on...

  12. State of the City

    Mayor Gailey presents the State of the City address at the April 15 City Council Meeting. Read on...

  13. Sewer Utility Tax Update

    Starting March 1, 2025, the city will start collecting a sewer utility tax from the Lake Stevens Sewer District Read on...

  14. Splash!

    Dive in to learn about what is going on around the lake. Read on...

  15. Volunteer Opportunities

    Are you looking for ways to support your local community? Read on...

  16. Davies Beach Boat Launch Closing for Underwater Work

    The boat launch will be closed from 9 AM to 12 PM on Sunday, April 27, for underwater projects. Read on...
